bibl.title: Berenike on the Red Sea and Its Hinterland.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994. Report of the 1996 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert (Leiden, 1998).
